mapper.sql: a.spa_code AS "spaCode", a.spa_name AS "spaName", a.spa_contacts AS "spaContacts", a.spa_phone AS "spaPhone", a.spa_address AS "spaAddress", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sch_patent_agency( spa_code, spa_name, spa_contacts, spa_phone, spa_address, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{spaCode}, #{spaName}, #{spaContacts}, #{spaPhone}, #{spaAddress}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sch_patent_agency SET spa_name = #{spaName}, spa_contacts = #{spaContacts}, spa_phone = #{spaPhone}, spa_address = #{spaAddress}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE spa_code = #{spaCode}
